hiveArticle.title: 'Global terrorist' Syed Salahuddin boasts to Pakistan TV channel that he 'carried out terror attacks in India'
hiveArticle.body:
Recently designated 'global terrorist' by the US, Syed Salahuddin + boasted to a Pakistani television channel that he and his outfit the Hizbul Mujahideen (HM) have carried out terror attacks+ in India, reported ANI.

"Till now our focus was on Indian occupation forces. All the operations that we have done or are underway, we focus only on the installations of these occupational forces," Salahuddin said in an interview+ with Geo TV.

The US state department's notification specifies that all Americans are now "generally prohibited from engaging in transactions with Salahuddin and all of Salahuddin's property and interests in property subject to United States jurisdiction are blocked," the US state department said in its notification.
